Posts.Content: hi everyone, i am very new to this site (and to the whole notion of breast cancer!) Was diagnosed last week and in for pre-op tomorrow and lumpectomy on 18th. I am trying to keep things as normal as possible, especially for my little boy (8) as i am a single parent with no family nearby. Sounds a silly thing to worry about but we have a holiday booked for end July which will be 5 weeks after surgery. I'm damned if my son is going to miss out on his holiday, but i am also aware that i am due to start radiotherapy around then. will we be allowed to go do you think? thanks all.
Posts.Title: holiday!

Posts.Content: Thank you both for your replies. Its funny what you worry about isnt it, but it just seems so unfaur that my son should have his summer completely ruined! Thanks too for yiur wishes...I'm in for my pre-op today!
